1.content: Analyze the complete codebase structure and document organization
1.details:
1. Review all directories from Phases 1-10
2. Map out the hierarchical file structure
3. Identify key configuration files, source code, documentation
4. Document the project scope and technology stack
5. Create comprehensive file inventory

2.details:
1. Document the overall system architecture
2. Create detailed file hierarchy diagram
3. Describe key directories and their purposes
4. List and describe all critical files with their functions
5. Document technology stack and frameworks used
6. Include system boundaries and integrations

3.content: Design User and Application Interaction Mermaid Diagram
3.details:
1. Map user types (doctors, nurses, administrators, patients)
2. Document user interaction flows
3. Show API endpoints and external integrations
4. Create mermaid flowchart showing user journey
5. Include authentication and authorization flows
6. Document data entry and retrieval processes

4.content: Design Application Logic Flow Mermaid Diagram
4.details:
1. Map core application workflows
2. Document AI model processing pipeline
3. Show data flow between components
4. Include error handling and logging flows
5. Create mermaid diagram showing system architecture
6. Document integration points and dependencies

5.details:
1. Document multi-cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP/Azure)
2. Include Kubernetes orchestration details
3. Document CI/CD pipeline and deployment processes
4. Show monitoring and logging architecture
5. Include security and compliance configurations
6. Document backup and disaster recovery procedures

6.details:
1. Compile all sections into a single markdown document
2. Ensure proper formatting and structure
3. Include all diagrams and technical specifications
4. Add executive summary and overview
5. Include appendices with technical details
6. Validate document completeness and accuracy
7. Create final polished version
